also_known_as: ばんどう こういちろう
biography: Naoki Bando (坂東 尚樹, Bandō Naoki, December 12, 1957) is a Japanese voice actor from Asahikawa, Hokkaido affiliated with Production Ace. Previously he was affiliated with Seinenza Theater Company, Nine Productions, Mausu Promotion, Liberta, and ALBA. His real name and former stage name is Kōichirō Bandō (坂東 耕一郎, Bandō Kōichirō).
name: Naoki Bando
